content: For the performance issue, does it help to remove the status bar from View > Toolbars?
creator: wsmwk

content:
1. Press the Alt key, then click View > Toolbars > Menu Bar.

2. The panel below the list of email files will show the email you select from the list above. If you don't want that, pressing F8 will get rid of that panel.
creator: siffemoz

content: Thanks Ed. I have retrieved the Menu Bar which enables me to perform tasks as previously. The 'New Message' panel for initiating a new email is still missing , but as per my earlier email, I can still compose and send emails. Your help is much appreciated. Regards, David
creator: terjesen

content:
terjesen said
The 'New Message' panel for initiating a new email is still missing...

Try TB menu bar > View > Folders > Folder Pane Header.
creator: siffemoz

content: All good Ed with 'New Message' panel retrieved. Thanks once again. Regards, David
creator: terjesen
